comments: Wonderful class! Professor Fee is a great teacher and is very passionate about your ideas and your success in the overall course.

This class was amazing. It's really what courses should end up being - a forum for you to explore an academic interest with a professor who is encouraging and critical where it counts all along the way...Identity as a subject is something that will also force you to take a look at yourself and see where you fir in the world as an academic and just as a human. You'll grow from this class and explore whatever interestes you all the while.
